verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 1:1
verses.text: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 1:2
verses.text: We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers;

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 1:3
verses.text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 1:4
verses.text: Knowing, brethren beloved, your election of God.
